   20: -module(erpc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([call/1, call_against_old_node/1,
   25:          call_from_old_node/1,
   26:          call_reqtmo/1, call_against_ei_node/1, cast/1,
   27:          send_request/1, send_request_fun/1,
   28:          send_request_receive_reqtmo/1,
   29:          send_request_wait_reqtmo/1,
   30:          send_request_check_reqtmo/1,
   31:          send_request_against_ei_node/1,
   32:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   33:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   34:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   35:          multicall/1, multicall_reqtmo/1,
   36:          multicall_recv_opt/1,
   37:          multicall_recv_opt2/1,
   38:          multicall_recv_opt3/1,
   39:          multicast/1,
   40:          timeout_limit/1]).
   41: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   42: 
   43: -export([call_test/4]).
   44: 
   45: -export([call_func1/1, call_func2/1, call_func4/4]).
   46: 
   47: -export([f/0, f2/0]).
   48: 
   49: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   50: 
   51: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   52: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   53: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   54: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   55: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   56: -endif.
   57: 
   58: suite() ->
   59:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   60:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   61: 
   62: all() ->
   63:     [call,
   64:      call_against_old_node,
   65:      call_from_old_node,
   66:      call_reqtmo,
   67:      call_against_ei_node,
   68:      cast,
   69:      send_request,
   70:      send_request_fun,
   71:      send_request_receive_reqtmo,
   72:      send_request_wait_reqtmo,
   73:      send_request_check_reqtmo,
   74:      send_request_against_ei_node,
   75:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection,
   76:      send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   77:      send_request_check_reqid_collection,
   78:      multicall,
   79:      multicall_reqtmo,
   80:      multicall_recv_opt,
   81:      multicall_recv_opt2,
   82:      multicall_recv_opt3,
   83:      multicast,
   84:      timeout_limit].
   85: 
   86: groups() -> 
   87:     [].
   88: 
   89: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   90:     [{testcase, Func}|Config].
   91: 
   92: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   96:     Config.
   97: 
   98: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  108:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  109:     call_test(Peer, Node, true, false).
  110: 
  111: call_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  113:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  114:                       OldRelName,
  115:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  116:         not_available ->
  117:             {skipped, "Not able to start an OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  118:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
  119:             compile_and_load_on_node(Node),
  120:             call_test(Peer, Node, false, false),
  121:             ok
  122:     end.
  123: 
  124: call_from_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  126:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  127:                       OldRelName,
  128:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  129:         not_available ->
  130:             {skipped, "Not able to start an OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  131:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
  132:             try
  133:                 compile_and_load_on_node(Node),
  134:                 ok = erpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, call_test, [undefined, node(), false, true])
  135:             after
  136:                 peer:stop(Peer)
  137:             end
  138:     end.
  139: 
  140: call_test(Peer, Node, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer) ->
  141:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  142:             call_test(Peer, node(), 10000, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  143:             call_test(Peer, node(), infinity, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  144:             try
  145:                 erpc:call(node(), timer, sleep, [100], 10),
  146:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  147:             catch
  148:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  149:                     ok
  150:             end,
  151:             try
  152:                 erpc:call(node(), fun () -> timer:sleep(100) end, 10),
  153:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  154:             catch
  155:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  156:                     ok
  157:             end;
  158:        true ->
  159:             ok
  160:     end,
  161:     call_test(Peer, Node, 10000, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  162:     call_test(Peer, Node, infinity, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer),
  163:     try
  164:         erpc:call(Node, timer, sleep, [100], 10),
  165:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  166:     catch
  167:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  168:             ok
  169:     end,
  170:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  171:             try
  172:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> timer:sleep(100) end, 10),
  173:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  174:             catch
  175:                 error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  176:                     ok
  177:             end;
  178:        true ->
  179:             ok
  180:     end,
  181:     if not ToTestServer ->
  182:             try
  183:                 erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  184:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  185:             catch
  186:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  187:                     ok
  188:             end,
  189:             if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  190:                     try
  191:                         erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  192:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  193:                     catch
  194:                         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  195:                             ok
  196:                     end;
  197:                true ->
  198:                     ok
  199:             end,
  200:             try
  201:                 erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  202:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  203:             catch
  204:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  205:                     ok
  206:             end;
  207:        true ->
  208:             ok
  209:     end,
  210:     try
  211:         erpc:call(badnodename, erlang, node, []),
  212:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  213:     catch
  214:         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  215:             ok
  216:     end,
  217: 
  218:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  219:     [] = flush([]),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: call_test(Peer, Node, Timeout, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer) ->
  223:     io:format("call_test(~p, ~p, ~p, ~p, ~p)~n",
  224:               [Peer, Node, Timeout, NodesOfSameRelease, ToTestServer]),
  225:     Node = erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], Timeout),
  226:     try
  227:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, error, [oops|invalid], Timeout),
  228:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  229:     catch
  230:         error:{exception, badarg, [{erlang,apply,[erlang,error,[oops|invalid]],_}]} ->
  231:             ok
  232:     end,
  233:     try
  234:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, error, [oops], Timeout),
  235:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  236:     catch
  237:         error:{exception, oops, [{erlang,error,[oops],_}]} ->
  238:             ok
  239:     end,
  240:     try
  241:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, exit, [oops], Timeout),
  242:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  243:     catch
  244:         exit:{exception, oops} ->
  245:             ok
  246:     end,
  247:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  248:             try
  249:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:exit(oops) end, Timeout),
  250:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  251:             catch
  252:                 exit:{exception, oops} ->
  253:                     ok
  254:             end;
  255:        true ->
  256:             ok
  257:     end,
  258:     try
  259:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, throw, [oops], Timeout),
  260:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  261:     catch
  262:         throw:oops ->
  263:             ok
  264:     end,
  265:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  266:             try
  267:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> erlang:throw(oops) end, Timeout),
  268:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  269:             catch
  270:                 throw:oops ->
  271:                     ok
  272:             end,
  273:             case {node() == Node, Timeout == infinity} of
  274:                 {true, true} ->
  275:                     %% This would kill the test since local calls
  276:                     %% without timeout is optimized to execute in
  277:                     %% calling process itself...
  278:                     ok;
  279:                 _ ->
  280:                     ExitSignal = fun () ->
  281:                                          exit(self(), oops),
  282:                                          receive after infinity -> ok end
  283:                                  end,
  284:                     try
  285:                         erpc:call(Node, ExitSignal, Timeout),
  286:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  287:                     catch
  288:                         exit:{signal, oops} ->
  289:                             ok
  290:                     end,
  291:                     try
  292:                         erpc:call(Node, erlang, apply, [ExitSignal, []], Timeout),
  293:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  294:                     catch
  295:                         exit:{signal, oops} ->
  296:                             ok
  297:                     end
  298:             end;
  299:        true ->
  300:             ok
  301:     end,
  302:     try
  303:         erpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, call_func1, [boom], Timeout),
  304:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  305:     catch
  306:         error:{exception,
  307:                {exception,
  308:                 boom,
  309:                 [{?MODULE, call_func3, A2, _},
  310:                  {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]},
  311:                [{erpc, call, A1, _},
  312:                 {?MODULE, call_func1, 1, _}]}
  313:           when ((A1 == 5)
  314:                 orelse (A1 == [Node, ?MODULE, call_func2, [boom]]))
  315:                andalso ((A2 == 1)
  316:                         orelse (A2 == [boom])) ->
  317:             ok
  318:     end,
  319:     if NodesOfSameRelease ->
  320:             try
  321:                 erpc:call(Node, fun () -> ?MODULE:call_func1(boom) end, Timeout),
  322:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  323:             catch
  324:                 error:{exception,
  325:                        {exception,
  326:                         boom,
  327:                         [{?MODULE, call_func3, A4, _},
  328:                          {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]},
  329:                        [{erpc, call, A3, _},
  330:                         {?MODULE, call_func1, 1, _},
  331:                         {erlang, apply, 2, _}]}
  332:                   when ((A3 == 5)
  333:                         orelse (A3 == [Node, ?MODULE, call_func2, [boom]]))
  334:                        andalso ((A4 == 1)
  335:                                 orelse (A4 == [boom])) ->
  336:                     ok
  337:             end;
  338:        true ->
  339:             ok
  340:     end,
  341:     try
  342:         call_func4(Node, node(), 10, Timeout),
  343:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  344:     catch
  345:         error:Error1 ->
  346: %%%            io:format("Error1=~p~n", [Error1]),
  347:             check_call_func4_error(Error1, 10)
  348:     end,
  349:     try
  350:         call_func4(node(), Node, 5, Timeout),
  351:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  352:     catch
  353:         error:Error2 ->
  354: %%%            io:format("Error2=~p~n", [Error2]),
  355:             check_call_func4_error(Error2, 5)
  356:     end,
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: check_call_func4_error({exception,
  360:                          badarg,
  361:                          [{?MODULE, call_func5, _, _},
  362:                           {?MODULE, call_func4, _, _}]},
  363:                          0) ->
  364:     ok;
  365: check_call_func4_error({exception,
  366:                         Exception,
  367:                         [{erpc, call, _, _},
  368:                          {?MODULE, call_func5, _, _},
  369:                          {?MODULE, call_func4, _, _}]},
  370:                        N) ->
  371:     check_call_func4_error(Exception, N-1).
  372:     
  373: call_func1(X) ->
  374:     erpc:call(node(), ?MODULE, call_func2, [X]),
  375:     ok.
  376: 
  377: call_func2(X) ->
  378:     call_func3(X),
  379:     ok.
  380: 
  381: call_func3(X) ->
  382:     erlang:error(X, [X]).
  383:     
  384: call_func4(A, B, N, T) ->
  385:     call_func5(A, B, N, T),
  386:     ok.
  387: 
  388: call_func5(A, B, N, T) when N >= 0 ->
  389:     erpc:call(A, ?MODULE, call_func4, [B, A, N-1, T], T),
  390:     ok;
  391: call_func5(_A, _B, _N, _T) ->
  392:     erlang:error(badarg).
  393: 
  394: call_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     {ok, Node} = start_ei_node(Config),
  396:     %% Once when erpc:call() brings up the connection
  397:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  398:     disconnect(Node),
  399:     try
  400:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  401:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  402:     catch
  403:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  404:             ok
  405:     end,
  406:     true = lists:member(Node, nodes(hidden)),
  407:     try
  408:         erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, []),
  409:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  410:     catch
  411:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  412:             ok
  413:     end,
  414:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node).
  415: 
  416: call_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  418:                   try
  419:                       erpc:call(Node, erlang, send,
  420:                                 [self(), SendMe], Timeout),
  421:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  422:                   catch
  423:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  424:                   end
  425:           end,
  426:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  427: 
  428: reqtmo_test(Test) ->
  429:     %% Tests that we time out in time also when the request itself
  430:     %% does not get through. A typical issue we have had
  431:     %% in the past, is that the timeout has not triggered until
  432:     %% the request has gotten through...
  433:     
  434:     Timeout = 500,
  435:     WaitBlock = 100,
  436:     BlockTime = 1000,
  437: 
  438:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  439: 
  440:     erpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state,
  441:                                                      true]),
  442:     
  443:     SendMe = make_ref(),
  444: 
  445:     erpc:cast(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [block, BlockTime]),
  446:     receive after WaitBlock -> ok end,
  447:     
  448:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  449: 
  450:     Test(Node, SendMe, Timeout),
  451: 
  452:     Stop = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  453:     Time = erlang:convert_time_unit(Stop-Start, native, millisecond),
  454:     io:format("Actual time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
  455:     true = Time >= Timeout,
  456:     true = Time =< Timeout + 200,
  457:     
  458:     receive SendMe -> ok end,
  459:     
  460:     receive UnexpectedMsg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, UnexpectedMsg})
  461:     after 0 -> ok
  462:     end,
  463:     
  464:     peer:stop(Peer),
  465:     
  466:     {comment,
  467:      "Timeout = " ++ integer_to_list(Timeout)
  468:      ++ " Actual = " ++ integer_to_list(Time)}.
  469: 
  470: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     %% silently fail
  472:     ok = erpc:cast(badnodename, erlang, send, [hej]),
  473: 
  474:     try
  475:         erpc:cast(<<"node">>, erlang, send, [hej]),
  476:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  477:     catch
  478:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  479:     end,
  480:     try
  481:         erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, hej),
  482:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  483:     catch
  484:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  485:     end,
  486:     try
  487:         erpc:cast(node(), "erlang", send, [hej]),
  488:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  489:     catch
  490:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  491:     end,
  492:     try
  493:         erpc:cast(node(), erlang, make_ref(), [hej]),
  494:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  495:     catch
  496:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
  497:     end,
  498: 
  499:     erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, [self()|blupp]), %% silent remote error...
  500: 
  501:     Me = self(),
  502:     Ok1 = make_ref(),
  503:     ok = erpc:cast(node(), erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok1}]),
  504:     receive
  505:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
  506:     end,
  507:     ok = erpc:cast(node(), fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok1} end),
  508:     receive
  509:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
  510:     end,
  511:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  512:     Ok2 = make_ref(),
  513:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok2}]),
  514:     receive
  515:         {mfa, Ok2} -> ok
  516:     end,
  517:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok2} end),
  518:     receive
  519:         {a_fun, Ok2} -> ok
  520:     end,
  521: 
  522:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
  523: 
  524:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  525:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
  526: 
  527:     ok = erpc:cast(Node, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  528: 
  529:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  530:     [] = flush([]),
  531: 
  532:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
  533:     %% Both when erpc:cast() brings up the connection
  534:     %% and when the connection is up...
  535:     disconnect(EiNode),
  536: 
  537:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  538:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
  539: 
  540:     wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)) end),
  541:     
  542:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  543:     ok = erpc:cast(EiNode, fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
  544: 
  545:     receive
  546:         Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
  547:     after
  548:         2000 -> ok
  549:     end,
  550:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode),
  551: 
  552:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  553:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  554:                       OldRelName,
  555:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  556:         not_available ->
  557:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  558:         {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} ->
  559:             Ok3 = make_ref(),
  560:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok3}]),
  561:             receive
  562:                 {mfa, Ok3} -> ok
  563:             end,
  564:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, halt, []),
  565: 
  566:             ok = erpc:cast(OldNode, erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
  567: 
  568:             receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  569:             [] = flush([]),
  570:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
  571:     end.
  572: 
  573: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  574:     %% Note: First part of nodename sets response delay in seconds.
  575:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  576:     {ok, _Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "10"]),
  577:     {ok, _Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "20"]),
  578:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  579:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node2, ?MODULE, f, []),
  580:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node3, ?MODULE, f, []),
  581:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node1, erlang, error, [bang]),
  582:     ReqId5 = erpc:send_request(Node1, ?MODULE, f, []),
  583: 
  584:     try
  585:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, 1000)
  586:     catch
  587:         error:{exception, bang, [{erlang,error,[bang],_}]} ->
  588:             ok
  589:     end,
  590:     try
  591:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10)
  592:     catch
  593:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  594:             ok
  595:     end,
  596: 
  597:     %% Test fast timeouts.
  598:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2),
  599:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, 10),
  600: 
  601:     %% Let Node1 finish its work before yielding.
  602:     ct:sleep({seconds,2}),
  603:     {hej,_,Node1} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1),
  604: 
  605:     %% Wait for the Node2 and Node3.
  606:     {response,{hej,_,Node2}} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, infinity),
  607:     {hej,_,Node3} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3),
  608: 
  609:     try
  610:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10),
  611:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  612:     catch
  613:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
  614:             ok
  615:     end,
  616: 
  617:     receive
  618:         Msg0 -> ct:fail(Msg0)
  619:     after 0 -> ok
  620:     end,
  621: 
  622:     [] = flush([]),
  623: 
  624:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
  625: 
  626:     ReqId6 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  627:     
  628:     no_response = erpc:check_response({response, Node1}, ReqId6),
  629:     no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId6),
  630:     receive
  631:         Msg1 ->
  632:             {response, Node4} = erpc:check_response(Msg1, ReqId6)
  633:     end,
  634: 
  635:     ReqId7 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, halt, []),
  636:     try
  637:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId7),
  638:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  639:     catch
  640:         error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  641:     end,
  642: 
  643:     ReqId8 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  644:     receive
  645:         Msg2 ->
  646:             try
  647:                 erpc:check_response(Msg2, ReqId8),
  648:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  649:             catch
  650:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  651:                     ok
  652:             end
  653:     end,
  654: 
  655:     [] = flush([]),
  656: 
  657:     {ok, Node5} = start_ei_node(Config),
  658:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  659:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  660:     disconnect(Node5),
  661:     ReqId14 = erpc:send_request(Node5, erlang, node, []),
  662:     try
  663:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId14),
  664:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  665:     catch
  666:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  667:     end,
  668:     true = lists:member(Node5, nodes(hidden)),
  669:     ReqId15 = erpc:send_request(Node5, erlang, node, []),
  670:     try
  671:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId15),
  672:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  673:     catch
  674:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  675:     end,
  676: 
  677:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node5),
  678: 
  679:     [] = flush([]),
  680: 
  681:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
  682:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
  683:                       OldRelName,
  684:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
  685:         not_available ->
  686:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
  687:         {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} ->
  688: 
  689:             ReqId9 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  690:     
  691:             no_response = erpc:check_response({response, OldNode}, ReqId9),
  692:             no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId9),
  693:             receive
  694:                 Msg3 ->
  695:                     {response, OldNode} = erpc:check_response(Msg3, ReqId9)
  696:             end,
  697: 
  698:             ReqId10 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  699:                         
  700:             OldNode = erpc:receive_response(ReqId10),
  701: 
  702:             ReqId11 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  703:             {response, OldNode} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId11, infinity),
  704: 
  705:             ReqId12 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, halt, []),
  706:             try
  707:                 erpc:receive_response(ReqId12),
  708:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  709:             catch
  710:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  711:             end,
  712: 
  713:             ReqId13 = erpc:send_request(OldNode, erlang, node, []),
  714:             receive
  715:                 Msg4 ->
  716:                     try
  717:                         erpc:check_response(Msg4, ReqId13),
  718:                         ct:fail(unexpected)
  719:                     catch
  720:                         error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  721:                             ok
  722:                     end
  723:             end,
  724: 
  725:             [] = flush([]),
  726:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
  727:     end.
  728: 
  729: send_request_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  730:     %% Note: First part of nodename sets response delay in seconds.
  731:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "1"]),
  732:     {ok, _Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "10"]),
  733:     {ok, _Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["-erpc_test_delay", "20"]),
  734:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  735:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node2, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  736:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node3, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  737:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> erlang:error(bang) end),
  738:     ReqId5 = erpc:send_request(Node1, fun () -> ?MODULE:f() end),
  739: 
  740:     try
  741:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, 1000)
  742:     catch
  743:         error:{exception, bang, [{?MODULE, _, _, _},
  744:                                  {erlang,apply,2,_}]} ->
  745:             ok
  746:     end,
  747:     try
  748:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10)
  749:     catch
  750:         error:{erpc, timeout} ->
  751:             ok
  752:     end,
  753: 
  754:     %% Test fast timeouts.
  755:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2),
  756:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, 10),
  757: 
  758:     %% Let Node1 finish its work before yielding.
  759:     ct:sleep({seconds,2}),
  760:     {hej,_,Node1} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1),
  761: 
  762:     %% Wait for the Node2 and Node3.
  763:     {response,{hej,_,Node2}} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId2, infinity),
  764:     {hej,_,Node3} = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3),
  765: 
  766:     try
  767:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId5, 10),
  768:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  769:     catch
  770:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
  771:             ok
  772:     end,
  773: 
  774:     receive
  775:         Msg0 -> ct:fail(Msg0)
  776:     after 0 -> ok
  777:     end,
  778: 
  779:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
  780: 
  781:     ReqId6 = erpc:send_request(Node4, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  782:     
  783:     no_response = erpc:check_response({response, Node1}, ReqId6),
  784:     no_response = erpc:check_response(ReqId6, ReqId6),
  785:     receive
  786:         Msg1 ->
  787:             {response, Node4} = erpc:check_response(Msg1, ReqId6)
  788:     end,
  789: 
  790:     ReqId7 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, halt, []),
  791:     try
  792:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId7),
  793:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  794:     catch
  795:         error:{erpc, noconnection} -> ok
  796:     end,
  797: 
  798:     ReqId8 = erpc:send_request(Node4, erlang, node, []),
  799:     receive
  800:         Msg2 ->
  801:             try
  802:                 erpc:check_response(Msg2, ReqId8),
  803:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  804:             catch
  805:                 error:{erpc, noconnection} ->
  806:                     ok
  807:             end
  808:     end,
  809: 
  810:     [] = flush([]),
  811: 
  812:     {ok, Node5} = start_ei_node(Config),
  813:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  814:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  815:     disconnect(Node5),
  816:     ReqId9 = erpc:send_request(Node5, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  817:     try
  818:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId9),
  819:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  820:     catch
  821:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  822:     end,
  823:     true = lists:member(Node5, nodes(hidden)),
  824:     ReqId10 = erpc:send_request(Node5, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
  825:     try
  826:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId10),
  827:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  828:     catch
  829:         error:{erpc, notsup} -> ok
  830:     end,
  831: 
  832:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node5).
  833: 
  834: 
  835: send_request_receive_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  836:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  837:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  838:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  839:                   try
  840:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, Timeout),
  841:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  842:                   catch
  843:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  844:                   end
  845:           end,
  846:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  847: 
  848: send_request_wait_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  849:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  850:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  851:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  852:                   no_response = erpc:wait_response(RID, 0),
  853:                   no_response = erpc:wait_response(RID, Timeout),
  854:                   %% Cleanup...
  855:                   try
  856:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, 0),
  857:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  858:                   catch
  859:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  860:                   end
  861:           end,
  862:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  863: 
  864: send_request_check_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  865:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
  866:                   RID = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, send,
  867:                                           [self(), SendMe]),
  868:                   receive Msg -> erpc:check_response(Msg, RID)
  869:                   after Timeout -> ok
  870:                   end,
  871:                   %% Cleanup...
  872:                   try
  873:                       erpc:receive_response(RID, 0),
  874:                       ct:fail(unexpected)
  875:                   catch
  876:                       error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
  877:                   end
  878:           end,
  879:     reqtmo_test(Fun).
  880: 
  881: send_request_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  882:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
  883:     %% Once when erpc:send_request() brings up the connection
  884:     %% and once when the connection is up...
  885:     disconnect(EiNode),
  886:     RID1 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  887:     RID2 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  888:     RID3 = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  889:     try
  890:         erpc:receive_response(RID1),
  891:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  892:     catch
  893:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  894:             ok
  895:     end,
  896:     try
  897:         erpc:wait_response(RID2, infinity),
  898:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  899:     catch
  900:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  901:             ok
  902:     end,
  903:     try
  904:         receive
  905:             Msg ->
  906:                 erpc:check_response(Msg, RID3),
  907:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  908:         end
  909:     catch
  910:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  911:             ok
  912:     end,
  913: 
  914:     true = lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)),
  915: 
  916:     RID1u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  917:     RID2u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  918:     RID3u = erpc:send_request(EiNode, erlang, node, []),
  919:     try
  920:         erpc:receive_response(RID1u),
  921:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  922:     catch
  923:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  924:             ok
  925:     end,
  926:     try
  927:         erpc:wait_response(RID2u, infinity),
  928:         ct:fail(unexpected)
  929:     catch
  930:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  931:             ok
  932:     end,
  933:     try
  934:         receive
  935:             Msgu ->
  936:                 erpc:check_response(Msgu, RID3u),
  937:                 ct:fail(unexpected)
  938:         end
  939:     catch
  940:         error:{erpc, notsup} ->
  941:             ok
  942:     end,
  943:     
  944:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode).
  945: 
  946: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  947:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
  948:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_success(N),
  949:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(N),
  950:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(N),
  951:     ok.
  952: 
  953: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
  954: 
  955:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
  956: 
  957:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
  958: 
  959:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end),
  960:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  961:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  962: 
  963:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
  964:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  965: 
  966:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
  967:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  968:     
  969:     {1, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  970:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  971: 
  972:     {200, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 7654, true),
  973:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  974: 
  975:     {400, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  976:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  977: 
  978:     no_request = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  979: 
  980:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0),
  981: 
  982:     ok.
  983: 
  984: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(N) ->
  985: 
  986:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
  987: 
  988:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
  989: 
  990:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1000 -> 1000 end end),
  991:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  992: 
  993:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
  994: 
  995:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 500 -> 500 end end),
  996:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  997: 
  998:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  999:     
 1000:     {1, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1001:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1002: 
 1003:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true)
 1004:     catch error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
 1005:     end,
 1006: 
 1007:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
 1008:     Abandoned = lists:sort(erpc:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
 1009: 
 1010:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
 1011:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, false)
 1012:     catch error:{erpc, timeout} -> ok
 1013:     end,
 1014: 
 1015:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1016: 
 1017:     ok.
 1018:     
 1019: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1020: 
 1021:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1022: 
 1023:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1024: 
 1025:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1026:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1027:     try
 1028:         nope = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1029:     catch
 1030:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1031:     end,
 1032: 
 1033:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1034:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1035:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1036:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1037: 
 1038:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1039: 
 1040:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC5, infinity, true)
 1041:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1042:               end,
 1043: 
 1044:     4 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1045: 
 1046:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 2000, false)
 1047:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, _} -> ok
 1048:     end,
 1049: 
 1050:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false)
 1051:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, _} -> ok
 1052:     end,
 1053:     
 1054:     {600, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false),
 1055: 
 1056:     try not_valid = erpc:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, false)
 1057:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1058:     end,
 1059: 
 1060:     0 = erpc:receive_response(ReqId0),
 1061: 
 1062:     ok.
 1063: 
 1064: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1065:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1066:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_success(N),
 1067:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(N),
 1068:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(N),
 1069:     ok.
 1070: 
 1071: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
 1072: 
 1073:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1074: 
 1075:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1076: 
 1077:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end),
 1078:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1079:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1080: 
 1081:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1082:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1083: 
 1084:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1085:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1086:     
 1087:     {{response, 1}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
 1088:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1089: 
 1090:     {{response, 200}, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 7654, true),
 1091:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1092: 
 1093:     {{response, 400}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
 1094:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1095: 
 1096:     no_request = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
 1097: 
 1098:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0),
 1099: 
 1100:     ok.
 1101: 
 1102: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(N) ->
 1103: 
 1104:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1105: 
 1106:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1107: 
 1108:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1109: 
 1110:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1000 -> 1000 end end),
 1111:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1112: 
 1113:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 1 -> 1 end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1114: 
 1115:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 500 -> 500 end end),
 1116:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1117: 
 1118:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
 1119:     
 1120:     {{response, 1}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1121:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1122: 
 1123:     no_response = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
 1124: 
 1125:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
 1126:     Unhandled = lists:sort(erpc:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
 1127: 
 1128:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
 1129:     {{response, 500}, req3, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
 1130:     {{response, 1000}, req1, ReqIdC4} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
 1131: 
 1132:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
 1133: 
 1134:     ok.
 1135:     
 1136: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1137: 
 1138:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1139: 
 1140:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1141: 
 1142:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1143:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1144:     try
 1145:         nope = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
 1146:     catch
 1147:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1148:     end,
 1149: 
 1150:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1151:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1152:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1153:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1154: 
 1155:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1156: 
 1157:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC5, infinity, true)
 1158:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1159:               end,
 1160: 
 1161:     4 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1162: 
 1163:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 2000, false)
 1164:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, _} -> ok
 1165:     end,
 1166: 
 1167:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false)
 1168:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, _} -> ok
 1169:     end,
 1170:     
 1171:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, infinity, false),
 1172: 
 1173:     try not_valid = erpc:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, false)
 1174:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1175:     end,
 1176: 
 1177:     {response, 0} = erpc:wait_response(ReqId0),
 1178: 
 1179:     ok.
 1180: 
 1181: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1182:     {ok, _P, N} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1183:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_success(N),
 1184:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(N),
 1185:     ok.
 1186: 
 1187: send_request_check_reqid_collection_success(N) ->
 1188: 
 1189:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1190: 
 1191:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1192: 
 1193:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1194:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
 1195: 
 1196:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> 200 end end),
 1197:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1198:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
 1199: 
 1200:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> 400 end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1201:     3 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
 1202: 
 1203:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1204: 
 1205:     no_response = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
 1206:     
 1207:     {{response, 200}, req2, ReqIdC4} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
 1208:     2 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
 1209: 
 1210:     {{response, 400}, req3, ReqIdC5} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
 1211:     1 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1212: 
 1213:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
 1214:     0 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
 1215: 
 1216:     no_request = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
 1217: 
 1218:     {response, 0} = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1219: 
 1220:     ok.
 1221:     
 1222: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(N) ->
 1223: 
 1224:     ReqId0 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> 0 end),
 1225: 
 1226:     ReqIdC0 = erpc:reqids_new(),
 1227: 
 1228:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 600 -> 600 end end),
 1229:     ReqIdC1 = erpc:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
 1230: 
 1231:     ReqIdC2 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 800 -> erlang:halt() end end, req2, ReqIdC1),
 1232: 
 1233:     ReqIdC3 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 200 -> error(errored) end end, req3, ReqIdC2),
 1234: 
 1235:     ReqIdC4 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> exit(exited) end, req4, ReqIdC3),
 1236: 
 1237:     ReqIdC5 = erpc:send_request(N, fun () -> receive after 400 -> throw(thrown) end end, req5, ReqIdC4),
 1238: 
 1239:     5 = erpc:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
 1240: 
 1241:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
 1242: 
 1243:     no_response = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC5, true),
 1244: 
 1245:     ReqIdC6 = try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true)
 1246:               catch exit:{{exception, exited}, req4, RIC6} -> RIC6
 1247:               end,
 1248:     
 1249:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1250:     catch error:{{exception, errored, _Stk}, req3, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1251:     end,
 1252: 
 1253:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1254:     catch throw:{thrown, req5, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1255:     end,
 1256:     
 1257:     {{response, 600}, req1, ReqIdC6} = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false),
 1258: 
 1259:     try not_valid = erpc:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC6, false)
 1260:     catch error:{{erpc, noconnection}, req2, ReqIdC6} -> ok
 1261:     end,
 1262: 
 1263:     {response, 0} = erpc:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1264: 
 1265:     ok.
 1266: 
 1267: multicall(Config) ->
 1268:     {ok, _Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1269:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1270:     {ok, Node3} = start_ei_node(Config),
 1271:     %% Test once when erpc:multicall() brings up the connection...
 1272:     disconnect(Node3),
 1273:     Node3Res = {error, {erpc, notsup}},
 1274:     {ok, _Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1275:     {ok, _Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1276:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
 1277:     {OldTested, {ok, _Peer6, Node6}}
 1278:         = case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
 1279:                             OldRelName,
 1280:                             proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 1281:               not_available ->
 1282:                   {false, ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0})};
 1283:               {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode} = OldNodeRes ->
 1284:                   compile_and_load_on_node(OldNode),
 1285:                   {true, OldNodeRes}
 1286:           end,
 1287:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1288:     io:format("Node1=~p~nNode2=~p~nNode3=~p~nNode4=~p~nNode5=~p~nNode6=~p~n",
 1289:               [Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5, Node6]),
 1290: 
 1291:     ThisNode = node(),
 1292:     Nodes = [ThisNode, Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5],
 1293:     
 1294:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1295:      {ok, Node1},
 1296:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1297:      Node3Res,
 1298:      {ok, Node4},
 1299:      {ok, Node5},
 1300:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1301:      {ok, Node6}]
 1302:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [badnodename] ++ [Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1303: 
 1304:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1305:      {ok, Node1},
 1306:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1307:      Node3Res,
 1308:      {ok, Node4},
 1309:      {ok, Node5},
 1310:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}}]
 1311:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [badnodename], fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1312: 
 1313:     try
 1314:         erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [<<"badnodename">>], erlang, node, []),
 1315:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1316:     catch
 1317:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1318:             ok
 1319:     end,
 1320:     
 1321:     try
 1322:         erpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5 | node()], erlang, node, []),
 1323:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1324:     catch
 1325:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1326:             ok
 1327:     end,
 1328:     
 1329:     
 1330:     try
 1331:         erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [<<"badnodename">>], fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1332:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1333:     catch
 1334:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1335:             ok
 1336:     end,
 1337: 
 1338:     try
 1339:         erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun (X) -> X end),
 1340:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1341:     catch
 1342:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1343:             ok
 1344:     end,
 1345: 
 1346:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1347:      {ok, Node1},
 1348:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1349:      Node3Res,
 1350:      {ok, Node4},
 1351:      {ok, Node5},
 1352:      {ok, Node6}]
 1353:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1354: 
 1355:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1356:      {ok, Node1},
 1357:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1358:      Node3Res,
 1359:      {ok, Node4},
 1360:      {ok, Node5},
 1361:      {ok, Node6}]
 1362:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes ++ [Node6], erlang, node, [], 60000),
 1363: 
 1364:     [{throw, ThisNode},
 1365:      {throw, Node1},
 1366:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1367:      Node3Res,
 1368:      {throw, Node4},
 1369:      {throw, Node5}]
 1370:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun () -> throw(erlang:node()) end),
 1371: 
 1372:     [{throw, ThisNode},
 1373:      {throw, Node1},
 1374:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1375:      Node3Res,
 1376:      {throw, Node4},
 1377:      {throw, Node5}]
 1378:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes,  fun () -> throw(erlang:node()) end, 60000),
 1379: 
 1380:     S0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1381:     [{error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1382:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1383:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1384:      Node3Res,
 1385:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1386:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1387:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1388: 
 1389:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1390:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1391:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1392:      Node3Res,
 1393:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1394:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1395:      {error, {erpc, timeout}}]
 1396:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000], 500),
 1397:     E0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1398:     T0 = E0 - S0,
 1399:     io:format("T0=~p~n", [T0]),
 1400:     true = T0 < 1000,
 1401: 
 1402:     S1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1403:     [{ok, ok},
 1404:      {ok, ok},
 1405:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1406:      Node3Res,
 1407:      {ok, ok},
 1408:      {ok, ok},
 1409:      {ok, ok},
 1410: 
 1411:      {ok, ok},
 1412:      {ok, ok},
 1413:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1414:      Node3Res,
 1415:      {ok, ok},
 1416:      {ok, ok},
 1417:      {ok, ok}]
 1418:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000]),
 1419:     E1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1420:     T1 = E1 - S1,
 1421:     io:format("T1=~p~n", [T1]),
 1422:     true = T1 < 3000,
 1423: 
 1424:     S2 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1425:     [{ok, ok},
 1426:      {ok, ok},
 1427:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1428:      Node3Res,
 1429:      {ok, ok},
 1430:      {ok, ok},
 1431:      {ok, ok},
 1432: 
 1433:      {ok, ok},
 1434:      {ok, ok},
 1435:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1436:      Node3Res,
 1437:      {ok, ok},
 1438:      {ok, ok},
 1439:      {ok, ok}]
 1440:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], timer, sleep, [2000], 3000),
 1441:     E2 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1442:     T2 = E2 - S2,
 1443:     io:format("T2=~p~n", [T2]),
 1444:     true = T2 < 3000,
 1445: 
 1446:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1447:      {ok, Node1},
 1448:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1449:      Node3Res,
 1450:      {ok, Node4},
 1451:      {ok, Node5},
 1452:      {ok, Node6},
 1453: 
 1454:      {ok, ThisNode},
 1455:      {ok, Node1},
 1456:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1457:      Node3Res,
 1458:      {ok, Node4},
 1459:      {ok, Node5},
 1460:      {ok, Node6}]
 1461:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], erlang, node, []),
 1462: 
 1463:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1464:      {ok, Node1},
 1465:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1466:      Node3Res,
 1467:      {ok, Node4},
 1468:      {ok, Node5},
 1469:      {ok, Node6},
 1470: 
 1471:      {ok, ThisNode},
 1472:      {ok, Node1},
 1473:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1474:      Node3Res,
 1475:      {ok, Node4},
 1476:      {ok, Node5},
 1477:      {ok, Node6}]
 1478:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6]++Nodes++[Node6], erlang, node, [], 60000),
 1479: 
 1480:     [{ok, ThisNode},
 1481:      {ok, Node1},
 1482:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1483:      Node3Res,
 1484:      {ok, Node4},
 1485:      {ok, Node5}]
 1486:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, fun () -> erlang:node() end),
 1487:     
 1488:     [BlingError,
 1489:      BlingError,
 1490:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1491:      Node3Res,
 1492:      BlingError,
 1493:      BlingError,
 1494:      OldBlingError]
 1495:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], ?MODULE, call_func2, [bling]),
 1496: 
 1497:     [BlingError,
 1498:      BlingError,
 1499:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1500:      Node3Res,
 1501:      BlingError,
 1502:      BlingError,
 1503:      OldBlingError]
 1504:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], ?MODULE, call_func2, [bling], 60000),
 1505: 
 1506:     {error, {exception,
 1507:              bling,
 1508:              [{?MODULE, call_func3, A, _},
 1509:               {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]}} = BlingError,
 1510:     true = (A == 1) orelse (A == [bling]),
 1511: 
 1512:     {error, {exception,
 1513:              bling,
 1514:              [{?MODULE, call_func3, OldA, _},
 1515:               {?MODULE, call_func2, 1, _}]}} = OldBlingError,
 1516:     true = (OldA == 1) orelse (OldA == [bling]),
 1517: 
 1518:     [{error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1519:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1520:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1521:      Node3Res,
 1522:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1523:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1524:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}}]
 1525:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], erlang, error, [blong]),
 1526: 
 1527:     [{error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1528:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1529:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1530:      Node3Res,
 1531:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1532:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}},
 1533:      {error, {exception, blong, [{erlang, error, [blong], _}]}}]
 1534:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes++[Node6], erlang, error, [blong], 60000),
 1535: 
 1536:     SlowNode4 = fun () ->
 1537:                         case node() of
 1538:                             Node4 ->
 1539:                                 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1540:                                 slow;
 1541:                             ThisNode ->
 1542:                                 throw(fast);
 1543:                             _ ->
 1544:                                 fast
 1545:                            end
 1546:                 end,
 1547: 
 1548:     Start1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1549:     [{throw, fast},
 1550:      {ok, fast},
 1551:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1552:      Node3Res,
 1553:      {error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1554:      {ok, fast}]
 1555:         = erpc:multicall(Nodes, erlang, apply, [SlowNode4, []], 500),
 1556: 
 1557:     End1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1558: 
 1559:     Time1 = erlang:convert_time_unit(End1-Start1, native, millisecond),
 1560:     io:format("Time1 = ~p~n",[Time1]),
 1561:     true = Time1 >= 500,
 1562:     true = Time1 =< 1000,
 1563: 
 1564:     SlowThisNode = fun () ->
 1565:                            case node() of
 1566:                                ThisNode ->
 1567:                                    receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1568:                                    slow;
 1569:                                Node4 ->
 1570:                                    throw(fast);
 1571:                                Node5 ->
 1572:                                    exit(fast);
 1573:                                _ ->
 1574:                                    fast
 1575:                            end
 1576:                    end,
 1577: 
 1578:     Start2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1579:     [{error, {erpc, timeout}},
 1580:      {ok, fast},
 1581:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1582:      Node3Res,
 1583:      {throw, fast},
 1584:      {exit, {exception, fast}}] = erpc:multicall(Nodes, SlowThisNode, 500),
 1585: 
 1586:     End2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1587: 
 1588:     Time2 = erlang:convert_time_unit(End2-Start2, native, millisecond),
 1589:     io:format("Time2 = ~p~n",[Time2]),
 1590:     true = Time2 >= 500,
 1591:     true = Time2 =< 1000,
 1592: 
 1593:     %% We should not get any stray messages due to timed out operations...
 1594:     receive Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 1595:     after 1000 -> ok
 1596:     end,
 1597: 
 1598:     [{error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1599:      Node3Res,
 1600:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1601:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}},
 1602:      {error, {erpc, noconnection}}]
 1603:         = erpc:multicall([Node2, Node3, Node4, Node5, Node6], erlang, halt, []),
 1604: 
 1605:     [] = flush([]),
 1606: 
 1607:     ok = stop_ei_node(Node3),
 1608:     case OldTested of
 1609:         false ->
 1610:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
 1611:         true ->
 1612:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
 1613:     end.
 1614: 
 1615: multicall_reqtmo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1616:     {ok, Peer1, QuickNode1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1617:     {ok, Peer2, QuickNode2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1618:     Fun = fun (Node, SendMe, Timeout) ->
 1619:                   Me = self(),
 1620:                   SlowSend = fun () ->
 1621:                                      if node() == Node ->
 1622:                                              Me ! SendMe,
 1623:                                              done;
 1624:                                         true ->
 1625:                                              done
 1626:                                      end
 1627:                              end,
 1628:                   [{ok, done},{error,{erpc,timeout}},{ok, done}]
 1629:                       = erpc:multicall([QuickNode1, Node, QuickNode2],
 1630:                                         erlang, apply, [SlowSend, []],
 1631:                                         Timeout)
 1632:           end,
 1633:     Res = reqtmo_test(Fun),
 1634:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1635:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1636:     Res.
 1637: 
 1638: multicall_recv_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1639:     Loops = 1000,
 1640:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1641:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1642:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1643:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1644:     ExpRes = [{ok, node()}, {ok, Node1}, {ok, Node2}],
 1645:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1646:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1647:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1648:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1649:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1650: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1651:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1652:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1653:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1654: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1655:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1656:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1657:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1658:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1659:     case Q > 10 of
 1660: 	true ->
 1661: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1662: 	false ->
 1663: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1664:     end.
 1665: 
 1666: multicall_recv_opt2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1667:     Loops = 1000,
 1668:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1669:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1670:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1671:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1672:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1673:     ExpRes = [{ok, node()}, {error, {erpc, noconnection}}, {ok, Node2}],
 1674:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1675:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1676:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1677:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1678:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1679: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1680:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1681:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1682:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1683: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1684:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1685:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1686:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1687:     case Q > 10 of
 1688: 	true ->
 1689: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1690: 	false ->
 1691: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1692:     end.
 1693: 
 1694: multicall_recv_opt3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1695:     Loops = 1000,
 1696:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1697:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1698:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1699:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1700:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1701:     Nodes = [node(), Node1, Node2],
 1702:     Fun = fun () -> erlang:node() end,
 1703:     _Warmup = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops div 10),
 1704:     Empty = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, infinity, Loops),
 1705:     io:format("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1706: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1707:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, HugeMsgQ)],
 1708:     Huge = time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, 0, Loops),
 1709:     io:format("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1710: 	      [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1711:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1712:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1713:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1714:     case Q > 10 of
 1715: 	true ->
 1716: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1717: 	false ->
 1718: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1719:     end.
 1720: 
 1721: time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, Times) ->
 1722:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1723:     ok = do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, Times),
 1724:     erlang:monotonic_time() - Start.
 1725: 
 1726: do_time_multicall(_Expect, _Nodes, _Fun, _Tmo, 0) ->
 1727:     ok;
 1728: do_time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N) ->
 1729:     _ = erpc:multicall(Nodes, Fun, Tmo),
 1730:     do_time_multicall(undefined, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N-1);
 1731: do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N) ->
 1732:     Expect = erpc:multicall(Nodes, Fun, Tmo),
 1733:     do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Fun, Tmo, N-1).
 1734: 
 1735: multicast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1736:     {ok, _Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1737:     {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(),
 1738:     {OldTested, {ok, _OldPeer, OldNode}}
 1739:         = case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0},
 1740:                             OldRelName,
 1741:                             proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 1742:               not_available ->
 1743:                   {false, ?CT_PEER()};
 1744:               {ok, _, _} = OldNodeRes ->
 1745:                   {true, OldNodeRes}
 1746:           end,
 1747:     Nodes = [node(), Node],
 1748:     try
 1749:         erpc:multicast(Nodes++[OldNode], erlang, send, hej),
 1750:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1751:     catch
 1752:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1753:     end,
 1754:     try
 1755:         erpc:multicast(node(), erlang, send, [hej]),
 1756:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1757:     catch
 1758:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1759:     end,
 1760:     try
 1761:         erpc:multicast([<<"node">>, Node], erlang, send, [hej]),
 1762:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1763:     catch
 1764:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1765:     end,
 1766:     try
 1767:         erpc:multicast(Nodes, "erlang", send, [hej]),
 1768:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1769:     catch
 1770:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1771:     end,
 1772:     try
 1773:         erpc:multicast(Nodes, erlang, make_ref(), [hej]),
 1774:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1775:     catch
 1776:         error:{erpc, badarg} -> ok
 1777:     end,
 1778: 
 1779:     %% Silently fail...
 1780:     erpc:multicast([badnodename], erlang, send, [self(), blupp]),
 1781:     %% silent remote error...
 1782:     erpc:multicast(Nodes, erlang, send, [self()|blupp]),
 1783: 
 1784:     Me = self(),
 1785:     Ok1 = make_ref(),
 1786:     ok = erpc:multicast(Nodes++[OldNode], erlang, send, [Me, {mfa, Ok1}]),
 1787:     receive
 1788:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1789:     end,
 1790:     receive
 1791:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1792:     end,
 1793:     receive
 1794:         {mfa, Ok1} -> ok
 1795:     end,
 1796:     ok = erpc:multicast(Nodes, fun () -> Me ! {a_fun, Ok1} end),
 1797:     receive
 1798:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
 1799:     end,
 1800:     receive
 1801:         {a_fun, Ok1} -> ok
 1802:     end,
 1803: 
 1804:     ok = erpc:multicast([Node, OldNode], erlang, halt, []),
 1805: 
 1806:     monitor_node(Node, true),
 1807:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1808:     monitor_node(OldNode, true),
 1809:     receive {nodedown, OldNode} -> ok end,
 1810: 
 1811:     ok = erpc:multicast([Node, OldNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1812: 
 1813:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1814: 
 1815:     [] = flush([]),
 1816: 
 1817:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 1818:     %% Test once when erpc:multicast() brings up the connection
 1819:     %% and once when the connection is up...
 1820:     disconnect(EiNode),
 1821: 
 1822:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1823:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
 1824: 
 1825:     wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(EiNode, nodes(hidden)) end),
 1826: 
 1827:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], erlang, send, [Me, wont_reach_me]),
 1828:     ok = erpc:multicast([EiNode], fun () -> Me ! wont_reach_me end),
 1829: 
 1830:     receive
 1831:         Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg})
 1832:     after
 1833:         2000 -> ok
 1834:     end,
 1835:     ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode),
 1836: 
 1837:     case OldTested of
 1838:         false ->
 1839:             {comment, "Not tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"};
 1840:         true ->
 1841:             {comment, "Also tested against OTP "++OldRel++" node"}
 1842:     end.
 1843: 
 1844: 
 1845: timeout_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1846:     Node = node(),
 1847:     MaxTmo = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
 1848:     erlang:send_after(100, self(), dummy_message),
 1849:     try
 1850:         receive
 1851:             M ->
 1852:                 M
 1853:         after MaxTmo + 1 ->
 1854:                 ok
 1855:         end,
 1856:         ct:fail("The ?MAX_INT_TIMEOUT define in erpc.erl needs "
 1857:                 "to be updated to reflect max timeout value "
 1858:                 "in a receive/after...")
 1859:     catch
 1860:         error:timeout_value ->
 1861:             ok
 1862:     end,
 1863:     Node = erpc:call(Node, erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
 1864:     try
 1865:         erpc:call(node(), erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
 1866:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1867:     catch
 1868:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1869:             ok
 1870:     end,
 1871:     [{ok,Node}] = erpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo),
 1872:     try
 1873:         erpc:multicall([Node], erlang, node, [], MaxTmo+1),
 1874:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1875:     catch
 1876:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1877:             ok
 1878:     end,
 1879:     ReqId1 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1880:     Node = erpc:receive_response(ReqId1, MaxTmo),
 1881:     ReqId2 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1882:     try
 1883:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId2, MaxTmo+1),
 1884:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1885:     catch
 1886:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1887:             ok
 1888:     end,
 1889:     ReqId3 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1890:     Node = erpc:receive_response(ReqId3, MaxTmo),
 1891:     ReqId4 = erpc:send_request(Node, erlang, node, []),
 1892:     try
 1893:         erpc:receive_response(ReqId4, MaxTmo+1),
 1894:         ct:fail(unexpected)
 1895:     catch
 1896:         error:{erpc, badarg} ->
 1897:             ok
 1898:     end,
 1899:     ok.
 1900:     
 1901: 
 1902: %%%
 1903: %%% Utility functions.
 1904: %%%
 1905: 
 1906: wait_until(Fun) ->
 1907:     case (catch Fun()) of
 1908:         true ->
 1909:             ok;
 1910:         _ ->
 1911:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1912:             wait_until(Fun)
 1913:     end.
 1914: 
 1915: old_release() ->
 1916:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 1917:     {OldRel++"_latest", OldRel}.
 1918: 
 1919: compile_and_load_on_node(Node) ->
 1920:     %% Recompile erpc_SUITE on the old node and load it...
 1921:     SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
 1922:     {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = erpc:call(Node, compile, file,
 1923:                                         [SrcFile, [binary]]),
 1924:     {module, ?MODULE} = erpc:call(Node, code, load_binary,
 1925:                                   [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]).
 1926: 
 1927: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1928:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1929:     Suffix = case os:type() of
 1930:                  {win32, _} -> ".exe";
 1931:                  _ -> ""
 1932:              end,
 1933:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"++Suffix),
 1934:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 1935:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 1936:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 1937:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 1938:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 1939:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 1940:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 1941:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 1942:     Parent = self(),
 1943:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 1944:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 1945:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1946:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 1947:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 1948:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 1949:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 1950:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 1951:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 1952:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 1953:                              receive
 1954:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 1955:                              end,
 1956:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 1957:                      end),
 1958:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 1959:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 1960:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 1961:         Error -> Error
 1962:     end.
 1963: 
 1964: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 1965:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 1966:     case get(Key) of
 1967:         undefined ->
 1968:             {error, no_handler};
 1969:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1970:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 1971:             receive
 1972:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 1973:                     Res
 1974:             after 3000 ->
 1975:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 1976:             end
 1977:     end.
 1978: 
 1979: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 1980:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 1981:         ok ->
 1982:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 1983:             case get(Key) of
 1984:                 undefined ->
 1985:                     {error, no_handler};
 1986:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1987:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 1988:                     receive
 1989:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 1990:                             put(Key, undefined),
 1991:                             ok
 1992:                     after 2000 ->
 1993:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 1994:                     end
 1995:             end;
 1996:         Error ->
 1997:             Error
 1998:     end.
 1999: 
 2000: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 2001:     receive
 2002:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 2003:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2004:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2005:             exit(Reason);
 2006:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 2007:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2008:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2009:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 2010:             exit(normal);
 2011:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 2012:             Ref = make_ref(),
 2013:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 2014:             receive
 2015:                 Ref ->
 2016:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 2017:             after
 2018:                 2000 ->
 2019:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 2020:             end;
 2021:         Msg ->
 2022:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 2023:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2024:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 2025:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 2026:     end,
 2027:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 2028: 
 2029: get_hostname() ->
 2030:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 2031: 
 2032: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 2033:     HostName;
 2034: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 2035:     get_hostname(Rest).
 2036: 
 2037: flush(L) ->
 2038:     receive
 2039: 	M ->
 2040: 	    flush([M|L])
 2041:     after 0 ->
 2042: 	    L
 2043:     end.
 2044: 
 2045: disconnect(Node) ->
 2046:     case lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) of
 2047:         false ->
 2048:             ok;
 2049:         true ->
 2050:             monitor_node(Node, true),
 2051:             true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 2052:             receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 2053:             false = lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])),                
 2054:             ok
 2055:     end.
 2056: 
 2057: t() ->
 2058:     Delay = case init:get_argument(erpc_test_delay) of
 2059:                 {ok,[[D]]} -> list_to_integer(D);
 2060:                 _ -> 0
 2061:             end,
 2062:     1000*Delay.
 2063: 
 2064: f() ->
 2065:     timer:sleep(T=t()),
 2066:     spawn(?MODULE, f2, []),
 2067:     {hej,T,node()}.
 2068: 
 2069: f2() ->
 2070:     timer:sleep(500),
 2071:     halt().
 2072: 
 2073: next_msg() ->
 2074:     receive M -> M end.
 2075: 
 2076: flush_msgq() ->
 2077:     flush_msgq(0).
 2078: flush_msgq(N) ->
 2079:     receive
 2080: 	_ ->
 2081: 	    flush_msgq(N+1)
 2082:     after 0 ->
 2083: 	    N
 2084:     end.
 2085: 
 2086: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 2087:     receive
 2088:         Msg ->
 2089:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 2090:     after
 2091:         0 ->
 2092:             Msgs
 2093:     end.
